entry.title: Moving To Arch Linux: Humanity is Overrated
entry.summary:
"Ubuntu" comes from an ancient African word meaning: "I can't configure Debian."

-- Anonymous, 4chan /prog/

It's been a long time coming, but I've finally decided to move to Arch Linux, after using Ubuntu for basically my whole professional life...

entry.title: A Codeblogger's Apology
entry.summary:
After working in the industry for years and reading lots of programming blogs, I finally decided to start my own. A decent respect for the opinions of mankind demands I say why. Also, I wanted to start with more than 1 post.
